duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide safe, comfortable, and high-quality dialysis treatment to patients, monitoring their condition before, during, and after treatment.
Prepare machines for hemodialysis treatments, clean and disinfect machines after treatment, and conduct machine safety checks and logging results for quality control.
Adhere to appropriate safety measures, including the use of personal protective equipment, and ensure compliance with company policies and state/federal laws and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Certified Hemodialysis Technician (CHT) certificate or equivalent state-specific certification (if required)
